qrBankTransfer.title: QR Bank Transfer
qrBankTransfer.subtitle: Scan QR code to transfer automatically
qrBankTransfer.step3: 3. Scan QR code or enter information manually
qrBankTransfer.step4: 4. Confirm payment and wait for completion
qrBankTransfer.errorQRGeneration: Could not generate QR code. Please try again.
qrBankTransfer.errorTransactionNotFound: Transaction not found. Please check again after completing the transfer.
qrBankTransfer.errorCheckingTransaction: An error occurred while checking the transaction. Please try again.
qrBankTransfer.errorQRExpired: QR code has expired. Please generate a new one.
